name: TWICE
description: TWICE is one of the best-selling K-Pop girl groups, known for their catchy songs, synchronized choreography, and nine talented members from Korea, Japan, and Taiwan.

funFacts: First TWICE member to have a solo debut with 'POP!'
Known for her signature bunny teeth
Oldest member but often acts the youngest
Appeared in GOT7's 'Girls Girls Girls' MV pre-debut
Her solo album sold over 1 million copies
members.bio: Nayeon is TWICE's center and lead vocalist, known for her bunny-like visuals and powerful stage presence. She became the first TWICE member to debut solo in 2022, achieving massive success with 'POP!' and becoming a million-selling solo artist.

funFacts: Sister of actress Gong Seung-yeon
Known as TWICE's 'mom' for taking care of members
Had short hair for years, became her signature look
Took hiatus in 2020-2021 for health recovery
Often called 'No Jam Brother' for her serious humor
members.bio: Jeongyeon is TWICE's reliable lead vocalist known for her short hair and caring personality. She's often called the 'mom' of TWICE for looking after members. Her powerful vocals and stable performances make her essential to TWICE's sound.

funFacts: From Kyoto, Japan
Known as one of the best dancers in K-Pop
Was eliminated from Sixteen but brought back by JYP
Has a famous 'jokbal' (pig feet) mukbang video
Her abs are legendary among fans
members.bio: Momo is TWICE's Japanese main dancer, considered one of the best dancers in K-Pop. Despite being eliminated during SIXTEEN, JYP himself brought her back. Her powerful dance moves and lovable personality have made her a fan favorite.

funFacts: From Osaka, Japan
Famous for her 'Shy Shy Shy' aegyo that went viral
Known as the most affectionate member
Her 'No Sana No Life' phrase is iconic
Has a very bubbly, touchy personality with members
members.bio: Sana is TWICE's Japanese member known for her irresistible aegyo and bubbly personality. Her 'Shy Shy Shy' moment went viral and became one of K-Pop's most iconic scenes. She's known for being extremely affectionate with everyone.

funFacts: Trained for 10 years at JYP before debut
Known for her powerful vocals and leadership
Famous for her 'deer' eyes
Was a JYP trainee since age 8
Her shoulder-exposed outfits became iconic
members.bio: Jihyo is TWICE's leader and main vocalist who trained for a remarkable 10 years. Her powerful vocals, strong leadership, and characteristic deer eyes have made her the heart of TWICE. She's known as 'God Jihyo' for her incredible talent.

funFacts: From Kobe, Japan with 11 years of ballet training
Known as the 'Black Swan' for her elegant dancing
Very introverted and shy off-stage
Took a hiatus in 2019 for anxiety treatment
Loves gaming and is surprisingly competitive
members.bio: Mina is TWICE's Japanese main dancer with 11 years of ballet training. Known as the 'Black Swan,' her elegant, graceful movements set her apart. Despite being quiet and introverted, she's deeply loved by fans and members alike.

funFacts: Went viral pre-debut for 'Eagle Dance' at church
Known for her pale 'tofu' skin
The mood maker and variety star of TWICE
Can play piano - learned it in just 3 months
Famous for her witty humor and quick thinking
members.bio: Dahyun is TWICE's lead rapper and variety queen. She went viral before debut with her 'eagle dance' video. Her pale 'tofu' skin, quick wit, and mood-making abilities make her essential to TWICE's fun, energetic image.

funFacts: Known for her artistic talents - draws and paints
Has numerous tattoos despite conservative K-Pop industry
The shortest member but full of confidence
Writes her own rap lyrics
Her unique fashion sense stands out in TWICE
members.bio: Chaeyoung is TWICE's main rapper and artistic soul. Despite being the shortest, her confident rap delivery and unique style make her stand out. She's known for her tattoos, art skills, and independent fashion choices.

funFacts: From Tainan, Taiwan - TWICE's only Taiwanese member
Named 'Most Beautiful Face 2019' by TC Candler
Her flag controversy in 2016 made international news
Known for her goddess-like visuals
Very shy and quiet despite stunning looks
members.bio: Tzuyu is TWICE's Taiwanese visual and maknae. Her stunning visuals have earned her numerous 'most beautiful' titles globally. Despite her goddess-like appearance, she's known for being shy, quiet, and adorably clumsy.

seo.title: TWICE Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with ONCE
seo.description: Create your TWICE name with all 9 members - Nayeon, Jeongyeon, Momo, Sana, Jihyo, Mina, Dahyun, Chaeyoung & Tzuyu! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean names.
